title: Ink UI blocks Ralph - doesn't auto-exit after rendering
description:
The React Ink UI blocks Ralph from continuing because it waits for keyboard input that never works. Ralph calls the Ink UI, it renders, then waits forever for 'q' press.

Two issues:
1. Keyboard input (useInput) doesn't work - can't press 'q' to quit
2. Ink UI should auto-exit after rendering, not block waiting for input

Fix approach:
- For 'startup' and 'iteration' modes: render once then exit immediately
- For 'live' mode: keep running with file watch updates
- Remove keyboard handler for non-live modes (not needed)

acceptanceCriteria.text: Add auto-exit after render for 'startup' mode
Add auto-exit after render for 'iteration' mode
Keep 'live' mode running with file watching
Remove 'Press q to quit' message for non-live modes
Debug why useInput hook doesn't receive events
Check if raw mode is properly enabled for stdin
Test: Press 'q' exits live mode cleanly
Test: Ink UI renders startup then exits
Test: Ink UI renders iteration then exits
Run CodeRabbit review - must pass (or create BUG if unfixable)
Commit: fix: BUG-024 Ink UI auto-exit for non-live modes
